text:
The Challenge S38 Keep Friends Close on The Challenge: Ride or Dies

The tension heats up as relationships are put to the test and challenges get tougher in the competition to win big money on The Challenge: Ride or Dies, premiering October 12 at 8/7c.
title: Mariah Carey's Ice Cream Meltdown - (Video Clip)

meta_data.description: Mariah makes a surprise appearance on 'TRL' in 2001, and goes a bit berzerk in the process.
